title: I can make music
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Music - Instruction and study
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teaching - Aids and devices
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children

description: Shows various methods of working with children, including the Orff method, which involves young children in actively responding to music. Highlights movement to music and the music of different cultures from places such as Mexico and South America. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
